QuestData.Title: WANTED: Inquisitor Ithriza
QuestData.Description:
Wanted for attacks against the Horde!
Inquisitor Ithriza is responsible for leading several raids and ambushes against our soldiers.
Last seen in the vicinity of Dragon's Teeth Basin. Extreme caution advised!
Upon completion of the mission, report to Seacaller Unow for commendation.
QuestData.LogDescription: Retrieve the head of Inquisitor Ithriza.
